702527f-a.title: Brooklyn: 12th Street (West) - Driggs Avenue
702527f-a.text:
West 12th Street, north from the Coney Island (Reigelmann) Boardwalk;
showing Ocean and Wards Baths.
August 8, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.

702525f-a.title: Brooklyn: 12th Street (West) - Driggs Avenue
702525f-a.text:
West 12th Street, at the S.W. corner of the Sowery, (Coney Island).
A view of Joe's Restaurant, whose specialty is Hot Corn.
July 4, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
